basics.name: David Herman
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am pursuing a B.A. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2019.

work.summary: Part-time. I currently run and maintain the sound board for HPR 1 & HPR 2. Responsibilities include editing programs to fit HPR's format, taking regular power readings from our transmitters, monitoring the sound levels for both stations, and running the scheduled programs, show promos, and sponsor credits. My regular shift requires me to work without supervision, and when I cover other shifts I'm required to be flexible with who I work with and their specific needs.

Part-time campus job. Ran the Special Issues Desk at UH Manoa's Ka Leo News. Responsible for the production of seasonal special issues. Organized with other desks and production staff to meet hard deadlines. Consulted with staff writers and edited their work.

Full-time. Ran the pastry kitchen for the Beach Chalet and Park Chalet restaurants. Duties included maintaining stock, planning menus, daily production for the restaurant, training new hires, and coordinating with my staff and the other management.

Full-time. Ran the early a.m. shift for the bakery. In charge of solo production of the first batch of bread and pastries before the store opened, and later on, working with a team of four to bake the rest of the products throughout the day.
